multiplechoiceresponse.p: What does the XLEN command return?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Pick one answer

choicegroup.choice: The number of messages in a stream
The length of a stream in bytes
The number of deleted stream messages
The number of field-value pairs in each message of the stream

div.p: XLEN tells us the number of messages in a stream. It will return 0 both in the case of an empty stream and a non-existent stream.
